TopicTitle: How do I re-transmit science like Scott does in Intersellar quest

Articles.Content: Basically, the Title says it all, but to elaborate, Scott re transmits the science he gets 2-3 times, say it was 40% and gets it all doing it 2-3 times, this does'nt usually work, is there a mod for this or cfg file change

Welcome to the forums!

I believe you have to repeat the science experiment after transmitting, then transmit the second set of results. The Mystery Goo container and Science Jr. can only be used once unless cleaned with a Mobile Science Lab, though.

That's an older version. You used to be able to reuse all science parts, but now the biggest one need cleaning after a single use (you need a science lab to clean. Without, they are simply single use)

That's an older version. You used to be able to reuse all science parts, but now the biggest one need cleaning after a single use (you need a science lab to clean. Without, they are simply single use)

Pssst: Scott Manley plays on 23.5, which is several versions after that behavior was changed.

Pssst: Scott Manley plays on 23.5, which is several versions after that behavior was changed.

He does /now/. However, Interstellar Quest began on November 3, 2012 when v 0.22 was the current version, when all the science parts were reusable, and beamspam could effectively extract all the science from a location. v0.23, which changed that behavior to the way things work now, was released about a month and a half after the first Interstellar Quest video.
Ah, he upgraded mid-show? Guess I must have missed that...

Pssst: Scott Manley plays on 23.5, which is several versions after that behavior was changed.

Intersetellar quest started LONG before 23.5 came out
